aboutMe.profile_content: With 5 years of web3 experience, I have honed my skills in frontend/backend/smart contract development, with a focus on building and expanding a blockchain project
aboutMe.tech_content: I special in Rush/C++/TypeScript with a focus on Solana ecosystem
aboutMe.remote_content: Remote work available for exceptional company/projects from all around the world
aboutMe.passion_content: I love solving problems and building things through code. Programming isn't just my profession—it's my passion. I enjoy exploring new technologies, and enhancing my skills.

myProjects.title: Box Fulcrum - Multi-assets Lending Platform
myProjects.desc: Box Fulcrum is a fully functional, multi-asset lending protocol built on the Solana Devnet.
myProjects.subdesc: This platform is designed and developed from the ground up, featuring independently crafted front-end and smart contracts. It empowers users to perform a wide range of DeFi operations, including lending, borrowing, withdrawing, repaying, and liquidating assets with ease and efficiency.

myProjects.title: Solana Swap Platform
myProjects.desc: Solana Swap is a functionally demo to support any swaps between two Spl-tokens
myProjects.subdesc: The front-end/smart contracts of this project are independently developed and deployed on Solana devnet. Users can perform offering/swapping action to exchange their tokens seamlessly.

myProjects.title: Solana Lottery Platform
myProjects.desc: Solana Lottery supports users to buy lottery tickets and draw lottery numbers
myProjects.subdesc: The front-end/smart contracts of this project are independently developed and deployed on Solana devnet. Users can easilty create a lottery pool or join the bid of other pools

myProjects.title: XORA - AI video SaaS Website
myProjects.desc: Xora is a Modern UI/UX SaaS website developed using React.js and Tailwind CS.
myProjects.subdesc: With a focus on the user experience, Xora is a modern SaaS website that provides a variety of services to users. The website is developed using React.js and Tailwind CSS, and the user interface is designed to be simple and intuitive.

myProjects.title: KuCoin Spotlight - IEO platform of KuCoin
myProjects.desc: KuCoin Spotlight is one of most popular IEO platform in the world
myProjects.subdesc: I have re-designed and set the rules of product, from 2020 to 2022, i have responsible for holding the 5th - 24th Spotlight events includes famous projects like LUKSO, VELO

workexperience.name: Easton Wason
workexperience.title: Responsible for the development of active phased array radar quality control software, using the program to convert the radar raw signal into image data that can be used by business software, responsible for optimizing C++ programs (including data structure optimization, multi-threading optimization, memory usage optimization, code logic optimization, algorithm optimization, etc.), compared with the old version of the program, the overall efficiency is improved by 3-4 times

workexperience.name: Thunder Software
workexperience.title: Responsible for the development of the autonomous driving map learning module. As a core module developer, he is responsible for the entire development cycle from project launch to delivery. Designed and implemented high-performance C++ algorithms, including data import, data cleaning, and clustering algorithms, to ensure that the generated high-precision maps have sufficient accuracy and scalability.

workexperience.name: KuCoin
workexperience.title: Build the spot operation department of the exchange from 0 to 1. As the core department of the company, lead the team to manage the operation of all over 500 cash currencies in the entire life cycle of the exchange

contact.title: Let's talk
contact.description: Whether you’re looking to build a new dapp, improve your existing blockchain project, or bring a unique idea to life, I’m here to help.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.p_message: ex., I have a project in mind that I’d like to discuss with you.
